channel.title: Deep Learning on Y Violet Guo
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Y Violet Guo

item.title: Deep Learning
item.description: ECE521 Inference Learning Algorithm Code available at Github repo here ECE521 was a grad/undergrad intro machine learning course, with an emphasis on tensorflow programming. A1: knn in tensorflow A2: logistic regression in tensorflow A3: fully connected NN in tensorflow A3: fully connected NN Implemented Dropout - prevent overfitting Xavier Initialization Relu activation function Early stopping vectorized matrix multiplications batch/epoch training Installation Install Tensorflow with Conda
